nodes.text: Horn Ambigene was a male individual who served as a general within the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. Following the conclusion of the conflict, Ambigene became the leader of the Bryx Freedom Fighters, a force of Separatist holdouts that operated in the Bryx sector. Following the Declaration of Rebellion, Ambigene publicly renounced his Separatist past, and during the Galactic Civil War he brought the Freedom Fighters into the fold of the Rebel Alliance, within which they became known as the Bryx Sector Force.
